description: System-generated unique identifier for each employee labor rate type record; used as the primary key and for joining to related tables.
Date and time the rate type record was last created or modified, with milliseconds for sequencing and audit; likely stored in UTC.
Business label of the employee labor rate category used for labor planning, costing, and billing in service operations.
Identifier of the equivalent record in a prior or external system, used for migration mapping and traceability; likely nullableâ€”confirm with SME.
Name of the source table in the legacy system corresponding to this record, enabling lineage and cross-reference during data migration; confirm with SME.
